Authorization error: email is not provided by social network
Unable to sign in. If you registered with a third-party account (e.g. Google), using your email as a login may not work. Try to sign in with a third-party account, or reset your password.
Not correct, but keep on trying\nand never give up!

This is the last hint available for this problem!
Thank you for being active Hyperskill citizen!
Are you sure you want to report this hint for spoilers, abuse or spam?
Select one option from the list
Select one or more options from the list
Put the items in the correct order
Match the items for each row
Choose one option for each row
Choose one or multiple options for each row
Check this box if you\'re confident your answer is correct, even if it\'s not automatically recognized as such. This lets you manually confirm its correctness.
The answer must be a number
Rearrange the lines to make the code work. Use the “Tab” button on the left to add indentation.
You\'ve unlocked a new problem type!
Now you can rearrange the lines to make the code work. Use the "Tab" button to add indentation.
Spacebot wrote some code for you, but made a few mistakes. Read through the task and correct the code!
To proceed, you need an IDE. Please continue learning on a computer.\n\nIf this is not an option for you right now, check out the available activities on your training screen.
Education is a journey, not a destination—enjoy each step towards becoming wiser.
Growth shows in every challenge you overcome and every lesson you learn.
Ideas grow when you ask questions, like flowers in a well-tended garden.
Listening and learning all your life fills your mind with valuable treasures.
Learning might be tough, but it brings you knowledge that lasts forever.
Push your limits today to unlock new opportunities tomorrow; each topic you master opens up more.
Keep being curious, and you\'ll keep finding new possibilities.
Use what you learn to make a better future; every new thing you understand can change the world.
Finding new things is at the heart of learning, and it keeps your mind excited and full of wonder.
Every lesson is a step toward achieving great things.
Every lesson lights up your path to understanding more and more.
Knowledge is like a map that shows you what\'s possible and helps you think big.
Learning takes you places far from where you started; each new skill is like a ticket to new adventures.
Learn more, and you\'ll see more benefits in life, from clearer thinking to better decisions.
Learning weaves your skills together, turning bits of information into complete understanding.
Learning is a journey of self-discovery, with each step marking your progress.
Learn something new to change how you see the world, making it richer and fuller.
Education keeps your mind active, mixing ideas like notes in a beautiful song.
Understand more to handle life’s challenges better and move forward with confidence.
Every topic you finish builds up your knowledge, making you stronger and smarter.
Keep practicing to achieve your learning goal
Applied core topics by completing project stages
View the full version of profile in web
Hyperskill Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Your account on Hyperskill (JetBrains Academy) will be deleted. You will no longer be able to use this account both in the app and on the website.
Rate us in the App Store
Rate us on the Play Store
Solve a problem to get a place on the leaderboard
Oops! We were unable to load the leaderboard.
The application needs to restart to update the configuration
Oops! It seems like the network error.
The freeze automatically saves your progress if you miss a day and do not solve a problem.\n\nThe streak count will remain the same and won\'t get lost.
No problems to solve. Complete more topics to unlock a new problem.
Solve a random problem using the topics you already know to practice what you\'ve learned.
Get back later to solve another problem.
For now, you\'ve repeated all recommended topics
Try to recall what you\'ve learned by solving one problem for each topic. Return to theory if you experience any difficulties.
Good job! Keep repeating the topics – it helps you learn better.
For now, you have repeated all available topics
There are no topics to repeat for the %s course
I\'ve learned these topics! Why repeating them?

You retain more knowledge and build up your skill.

Some skills and concepts take time to master. Coming back to them increases your chance to successfully apply them to the real world problems.

How does it work? We rely on the spaced repetition technique and recommend that you repeat each topic three times within a month after you first complete it.
Explore all courses and find the right one by choosing a specific area of knowledge
Taking the first step is half the battle. You\'re doing great! Let\'s practice for a bit to keep your learning streak going.
Even 5 minutes of studying will bring you closer to your learning goal. Come practice now!
A little practice will take you a long way
Daily study sessions are the best way to keep your coding skills sharp. Let\'s practice now!
Ready to crush your learning session?
Remember: progress beats perfection. Five minutes of daily practice will quickly amount to solid achievements. Let\'s study now!
Take 5 minutes to practice your coding skills now.
Hey! Do you have a minute?
It\'s time for your daily practice. Solve a problem to stay on top of your studies.
Completing even one programming task a day will keep your skills in top shape.
Your study session today might seem like a small step, but it\'s a giant leap towards your learning goal. Come practice now!
It\'s time for your study session
Take a moment to practice to continue your learning streak.
Don\'t let your efforts go to waste
Regular practice sessions are the key to consistent results. Come study now!
Making the first step is the hardest part. But you\'re doing amazing so far! Study now to keep your skills in top shape.
Take it one step at a time: daily study sessions are the quickest way to achieve your learning goals.
Me: Celebrating that I finally got a different error message 🥹

Code a little every day, wherever you are.

Lives refresh daily and get deducted when you make a mistake on a problem.

Build anything from small websites to large-scale web applications. The ultimate language for web development
The top choice for data science and machine learning. Start your journey with this easy-to-learn language and unlock a world of possibilities!
Enhance your development skills with the language that combines simplicity and power, perfect for Android and server-side applications!
